en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors Health and Happiness Festival!
en.content:
FusionExcel is proud to sponsor RM 10,000 to the Health and Happiness Festival to be held at the Grand Millennium Hotel, Kuala Lumpur 21st - 22nd March 2009. FusionExcel would like to thank the organizer of the event, Ms Myriam Oliveres for her great work to educate the public and to provide opportunities in the health industry. The patron of Health and Happiness Festival is Duli Yang Maha Mulia Sultanah Hajjah Kalsom binti Abdullah of Pahang.

Visit www.healthandhappinessfestival.com
